titleStmt.title: An humble vindication of a free admission unto the Lords-Supper published for the ease, support, and satisfaction of tender consciences (otherwise remediles) in our mixt congregations / as it was delivered at two sermons upon the occasion of this solemnity in the weekely labours of John Humfrey.
titleStmt.author: Humfrey, John, 1621-1719.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
